code: import React from'react';import AppointmentItem from'./AppointmentItem/AppointmentItem';import'./UserList.css';var appointmentList=function appointmentList(props){var appointment=props.appointments.map(function(appointment){var appointmentDate=new Date(appointment.date.substr(0,10)*1000).toISOString().slice(0,10);return React.createElement(AppointmentItem,{key:appointment._id,userId:appointment.authUserId,_id:appointment._id,title:appointment.title,date:appointmentDate,onDetail:props.onViewDetail});});return React.createElement("ul",{className:"user__list1"},appointment);};export default appointmentList;
